select player.game_id as game_id, game.name as game_name, game.type as game_type, user.id as user_id, user.name as user_name, user.nickname as user_nickname, user.sex as user_sex, user.weight as user_weight, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(user.gmt_create) as user_gmt_create, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(user.gmt_modify) as user_gmt_modify, user.is_deleted as user_is_deleted from game left join (player,user) on (game.id=player.game_id and player.user_id=user.id) where game.id=#{id} order by user.id limit #{offset},#{size}
